Name: Basilian
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Top up with Thomas Henry Ginger Ale
Instructions: MUDDLE cucumber and basil in base of shaker. Add next four ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger ale.
Review: Vegetable notes with hints of orange and ginger. Healthy tasting!
History: Created in 2005 by Duncan McRae at Dragonfly, Edinburgh, Scotland.
